Commenti.Body:
On his first appearance, he seemed pretty confident on the pitch.

I do see a lot of potential on him.

He made a really good impression on his brief appearances. He seems confident, strong and good on the ball. He just needs to learn to be a bit more tactically and positionally composed but if he does he could be one for the ages.
The future is bright with those two, hopefully Inzaghi can find a way get Palacios in more rotations.
